title: Extracts of tropical green seaweed Caulerpa lentillifera reduce hepatic lipid accumulation by modulating lipid metabolism molecules in HepG2 cells
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Kant Sangpairoj, Kanta Pranweerapaiboon, Chantarawan Saengkhae, Krai Meemon, Nakorn Niamnont, Montakan Tamtin, Prasert Sobhon, Waranurin Yisarakun, Tanapan Siangcham
